short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This replaces the watered-down term 'alt right' with a more fitting term.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you really tired of the media, your family members, and that really racist guy from high school who you keep on your social media because you're too lazy to actually unfriend him using watered-down, gentle terms like "alt-right" for the white supremacist neo-Nazi hate group that has recently gained national attention?

Me too. I am not a developer, I followed some instructional blog post by a guy who did all the hard work and literally left four blanks to fill with some pretty simple text. But I wanted to contribute, and to help my friends and loved ones start seeing some of the terrible going on in the world in terms everyone can understand.
